document_data.caption: A map showing the location of Thann Villa (labeled N10) north of Tower March.
document_data.name: Thann Villa
document_data.mainbody: '''Thann Villa''' was the family estate of the [[Nobility of Waterdeep|Waterdhavian noble house]] [[Thann]].
document_data.Location: The villa was located in the northwest section of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Waterdeep/North Ward|North Ward]] just north of [[Tower March]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Description: All three buildings that composed the villa compound were three stories tall.
